title: Why haven't twice been on studio choom? GOT7, Stray Kids and Itzy have all been on it. - Quora

response.answer_text: Well I noticed groups like Twice, Red velvet and BTS haven’t been there. Maybe because groups go there to promote themselves but these groups I listed already have stable fanbases and are already popular enough and promote somewhere else. For example Twice promotes in Japan, BP and BTS promote in America and idk much about Red Velvet but they surely promote somewhere else too! Hope that helped

Usually groups with a fanbase as big as Twice, BTS, EXO, Red Velvet never attend these types of shows or activities as they don’t need to promote themselves. They already have stable fanbases and going to such channels will not bring them anything they don’t already have.
